'''1.5.4''' is a minor update to the [[launcher]] released on December 12, 2014.

== Changes ==
* Test launcher<ref>{{Reddit2|sub=Minecraft|id=2p31cu|text=We need your help testing a new launcher!|author=Dinnerbone}}</ref>
** Update for the native bootstrap.
** Uses a local, launcher-managed Java runtime instead of system Java.
